Why LegacyCore?

Our platform delivers measurable results for insurance professionals.

62% Faster Application Processing

Our digital application system reduces processing time from an average of 5.2 days to just 2 days, allowing you to bind policies faster.

23% Higher Commission Recovery

Our tracking system identifies and recovers missed commissions, with clients averaging $2,800 in additional monthly revenue.

30% Increase in Closing Rate

Agents using our AI script assistant report closing 30% more sales compared to traditional methods, directly impacting your bottom line.

Powerful Features for Insurance Professionals

Everything you need to manage applications, track commissions, and grow your business.

Application Management

Reduce application processing time by 62% with digital forms and automated underwriting rules that catch errors before submission.

Commission Tracking

Track and reconcile 100% of your commission payments automatically, identifying discrepancies that recover an average of $2,800 monthly.

Client Management

Improve retention by 22% with our automated follow-up system that ensures no client falls through the cracks after policy purchase.

Performance Analytics

Identify your highest-performing sales strategies with customizable dashboards that highlight KPIs driving 80% of your business growth.

AI Script Assistant

Increase closing rates by 30% with our AI assistant that analyzes successful calls and suggests proven responses to client objections.

Multi-Agent Management

Reduce agent training time from 6 weeks to 10 days with standardized workflows and performance benchmarking against top producers.

Specialized for Life Insurance Professionals

LegacyCore is built specifically for life insurance agents, with tools designed to streamline client management, application processing, and commission tracking for all types of life insurance products.

Life Insurance Products

  • Term Life

    10, 15, 20, and 30-year terms

  • Whole Life

    Permanent coverage with cash value

  • Universal Life

    Flexible premiums and death benefits

  • Final Expense

    Simplified issue coverage

QUESTIONS

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about LegacyCore's platform, pricing, and implementation.

How long does implementation take?

Most customers are up and running within 48 hours. Our implementation team will guide you through the entire process, including data migration, training, and configuration.

Can I import my existing client data?

Yes, LegacyCore offers multiple import options. You can upload CSV files, connect directly to common CRMs, or have our team assist with a custom migration for larger datasets.

Which insurance carriers do you integrate with?

LegacyCore integrates with 40+ major insurance carriers including Prudential, MetLife, New York Life, MassMutual, Northwestern Mutual, and many more. View our full list of carrier integrations in our documentation.

Is my data secure with LegacyCore?

Absolutely. LegacyCore is SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant. We use bank-level encryption for all data, both in transit and at rest. Our platform undergoes regular security audits and penetration testing.

Can I use LegacyCore on my mobile device?

Yes, LegacyCore is fully responsive and works on any device. We also offer native mobile apps for iOS and Android that allow you to manage applications, track commissions, and communicate with clients on the go.

What kind of support is included?

All plans include 24/7 email and chat support. Professional and Enterprise plans include phone support and priority response times. Enterprise customers also receive a dedicated account manager.

Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

Yes, LegacyCore offers monthly plans with no long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time without penalty. We also offer annual plans at a discount for those who prefer that option.

Do you offer custom development for specific needs?

Yes, our Enterprise plan includes options for custom development and integrations. Contact our sales team to discuss your specific requirements and how we can tailor LegacyCore to your business.

Don't see your question here?
